    • Method Detail

      • createUnit

        public static org.unitsofmeasurement.unit.Unit createUnit(java.lang.String unitString)
        Parses the unit string into a Unit object. A unit unique to the string will be returned.
        Parameters:
        unitString - the string to parse
        Returns:
        the created Unit.

      • createConvUnit

        public static org.unitsofmeasurement.unit.Unit createConvUnit(java.lang.String unitString)
        Parses the unit string into a Unit object. When possible a known unit (e.g. kg, kg / m2, etc.) will be returned otherwise a unit unique to the string will be returned.
        Parameters:
        unitString - the string to parse
        Returns:
        the created Unit.
